description:
66% OFF!  Photo Effects Tablet Edition is the tablet version of Photo Effects Pro. With Photo Effects Tablet Edition you will be able to take advantage of several editing features right from your webOS tablet.  Have you ever taken a picture that you thought would look good in black and white? Or accidentally taken a picture horizontally and wished you would have taken it vertically? You can now rotate, crop, resize and add effects to your photos without first having to transfer them to your computer. This version allows you to set the filename before saving and includes a handy Undo feature. You can also email your finished photo directly from the app. 

Features 
------------------ 
Crop 
Rotate 
Flip 
Contrast 
Brightness 
Black & White 
Sepia 
Negative 
Color Tint 
Sketch 
Color Sketch 
Blur 
Puzzle 
Pixelate 
Emboss 
Soften 
Sharpen 
Old Noise 
Burn 

Other Features 
----------------- 
Undo 
Save as new name 
Resize 
Attach to Email

Support provided in: English
